articles.author: Anita Powell
articles.title: Biden hits Germany with lightning-quick visit focused on Middle East, Ukraine - VOA Asia
articles.description: The US president make an in-person push for transatlantic unity and scoops up Germany’s highest civilian honor
articles.content:
Berlin  President Joe Biden made a lightning-fast, pomp-filled visit to Germany Friday, making an in-person push for transatlantic unity and scooping up Germanys highest civilian honor.
